text: The <extra_id_0> OBF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA is expressed in a highly cell - specific manner , being most abundant in B cells and essentially absent in most of the other cells or tissues tested .

Furthermore , expression of <extra_id_0> OBF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in HeLa cells selectively stimulates the activity of a natural immunoglobulin promoter in an octamer site - dependent manner .
Thus , <extra_id_0> OBF-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> has all the properties expected for a B cell - specific transcriptional coactivator protein .
